config.title: Choose your NERC Bot-Tron Defense
config.subTitle:
The Incident Response Team reported the threat to E-ISAC. From this information and the forensic data we provided from the recovery, NERC designed several Bot-Tron Overlord defenses.
Time to kick some bot.

items.btnTxt: Brit Beacon, Scholar. Gentleman. Bot Hunter.
items.blurb:
Moustache Length: +4 inches
Rifle Name: Lord Brimstone
items.details:
Dog's Bullocks! Hire NERC's greatest living robot fighter (and his legendary rifle) from the other side of the pond to take care of your robot problem. The first human to ever kill a Bot-Tron Overlord, he's not called the Can Opener for nothing.
Robots need to be shot and by Jove, I'm the one to shoot them!

items.blurb:
Tow Cable Length: 800 meters
Last deployed: Planet Hoth
items.details:
Imported by NERC from a galaxy far, far away, these reconfigured speeders have already seen action against many-limbed attackers like our Bot-Tron Overlord. Travelling around a Bot-Tron ain’t like dustin’ crops, but pilot Harrison Groundrunner will bring this thing to its knees … errr joints.
"Witness the power of this fully operational tow cable!"

items.blurb:
Size: Classified
Use: Classified
Material: Classified
Launching Satellite: Classified
items.details:
Part of NERC's secret [Classified] program, this weapon drops [Classified] rods from satellites. Gravity increases the speed of the rods to Mach [Classified] until they impact the target causing [Classified]-level destruction. [Classified] guidance system ensures precision targeting.
"When you care enough to send the very best"
